entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0005.48] The date of 2024-12-31 used for Line of Credit Facility, Maximum Borrowing Capacity and the Subsequent Event Type [Axis] with a value of 900,000,000 is earlier than or the same as the reporting period end date of 2024-12-31. Either remove the subsequent event axis from this value, change the reporting period end date for the value or update the Document and Entity Information document period end date. The properties of this us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumBorrowingCapacity fact are: Period: 2024-12-31 Dimensions: us-gaap:SubsequentEventTypeAxis=us-gaap:SubsequentEventMember, us-gaap:DebtInstrumentAxis=gel:SeniorSecuredCreditFacilityRevolvingMember, us-gaap:LongtermDebtTypeAxis=us-gaap:LineOfCreditMember, us-gaap:CreditFacilityAxis=us-gaap:RevolvingCreditFacilityMember Unit: USD Rule version: 26.0.9 - gel-20241231.htm 8
